attributes.action: introduce legislation to make it iillegal for money raised under the BBC Licence Tax scheme to be used to purchase the houses of BBC staff or to be used to fund relocation packages of BBC staff who choose to move from one BBC employment site to another.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BBC Licence Tax payments are taken from law-abiding taxpaying citizens of this country to fund the making of televison programmes.  There is absolutely nothing in the 
BBC Charter which says that the money will be used to purchase houses nor to fund relocation packages of BBC Staff.  To do so should be illegal, and if it is not then it should be made so.
